articles.description: Will Tesla agree to open its Supercharger network to all EV drivers in order to be eligible for federal incentives? We should know soon.
articles.content: Ask anyone and they will tell you that the Tesla Supercharger network is the best in the US. It has more Level 3 EV chargers than any other. They are located along major routes adjacent to businesses… [+5697 chars]

articles.title: Chick-fil-A's Cauliflower Sandwich Is Already Mired in Controversy - Barron's
articles.description: The Atlanta-based chain on Monday will join the ranks of fast-food restaurants offering a meatless entrée.

articles.title: The Valentine's Day Gifts That Have Been Impacted Most (and Least) By Inflation - Lifehacker
articles.description: What to know before going shopping and making plans for the holiday.
articles.content: With Valentines Day coming up in a few days, those who choose to celebrate the holiday may opt to shower their loved one(s) with gifts. And while there are no one-size-fits-all tokens of affection, t… [+1598 chars]

articles.title: FTC seeks to ban non-compete clauses, affecting 30M Americans - CNN
articles.description: The FTC wants to end non-compete clauses, which restrict job prospects for more than 30 million Americans - from security guards to CEOs. "People feel trapped," says the FTC's Elizabeth Wilkins.

articles.description: Generative AI such as ChatGPT seem revolutionary. But they're just a precursor to what's known as technological singularity.
